about.details:
Brandbucket Media & Technology offers online and offline advertising media solution services to customers. Its offerings include digital marketing, ground events, event management, marketing technology services, outdoor media, and print media. Its outdoor media operations are spread across Thane & Mumbai. The business is further engaged in event management activities including planning, organizing, and managing all event activities.

Competitive strengths

  • Expertise in the outdoor media domain.
  • Customer-centric advertising media solution offerings.
  • Diversified product portfolio including digital marketing, event management, outdoor media, print media, etc.

faqs.question: What is the Brandbucket Media IPO?
faqs.answer:
Brandbucket Media IPO is a SME IPO of 1500000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.25 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹55 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 20, 2021, and closes on December 23, 2021.

Satellite Corporate Services Private Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Brandbucket Media IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Brandbucket Media IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Brandbucket Media IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Brandbucket Media IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Brandbucket Media IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Brandbucket Media IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Brandbucket Media IPO opens on December 20, 2021 and closes on December 23, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Brandbucket Media IPO?
faqs.answer: Brandbucket Media IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Brandbucket Media IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Brandbucket Media IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Brandbucket Media IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Brandbucket Media IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 28, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, December 30, 2021. Check the Brandbucket Media IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Brandbucket Media IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Brandbucket Media IPO listing date is on Friday, December 31, 2021.
